makers.displaymaker: Edgar Degas, 1834–1917; born and died Paris, France

texts.textentryhtml: Collection of the artist, sold at the 3rd Degas Sale (#377), 6-7 November, 1918, Paris. Albert E. McVitty [1876-1948]; gifted to Princeton University Art Museum.
